title: Spotted - meet, chat, date
description:
Spotted connects you with everyone around you that shares similar interests, hangs out at places you like, or has crossed your path.
Discover and find awesome people to socialize, do sports or just hang out.
How does it work:
- Get in touch with awesome people you have crossed paths with
- Post a note and find new friends to socialize, do sports or simply hang out with
- Discover who is hanging out at your favorite places and meet like-minded people
- Find out if someone is looking for you or leave an anonymous note for your missed connections
It has never been so easy to create new real life connections!
Our support team is always available for you. Just send us an email at: feedback@joinspotted.com
Privacy policy: http://www.joinspotted.com/privacy
Terms of use: http://www.joinspotted.com/terms
